summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of PriceHive collaborative price sharing app. Core functionality working well with one critical session management issue identified that affects direct URL navigation.

ui_bugs.issue: Users get logged out when navigating directly to protected URLs (e.g., /dashboard, /social, /admin). Session persistence fails on direct navigation.
Console warnings about missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components
ui_bugs.selector: Dialog components throughout admin and shopping list

integration_issues.issue: Authentication state not preserved when accessing protected routes directly

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and call-to-action buttons
User registration flow works correctly with proper validation
User login flow with test credentials (test@test.com / test123)
Admin login flow with admin credentials (admin@pricehive.com / admin123)
Dashboard loads with correct stats display (3 products, 1 price, 4 supermarkets, 6 users)
Social feed (Muro) displays existing posts with proper formatting
Shopping list page loads and displays existing lists
Shopping list creation with supermarket selection works
Analytics page loads with product and supermarket selection filters
Admin panel loads with all tabs accessible (Products, Categories, Brands, Supermarkets, Units)
Admin panel shows existing data (Units: Unidad, Kilogramo, Litro, Gramo)
Navigation between pages works when using navigation links (not direct URLs)
Admin navigation link visible for admin users
Proper user role display in navigation (Test User, Administrador)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical session management issue where users get logged out when navigating to protected URLs directly. This affects user experience when bookmarking or sharing direct links to dashboard, social feed, or admin pages. Session state should persist across direct navigation.
